details: This course is designed for professional. You can learn HTML, CSS,JAVASCRIPT. Another you can learn some kinds of css frameworks like Bootstrap,Tailwind. You will able to learn javascript library React js. Otherwise we we will give you a short brief about Angular. For backend develop you will learn Node js(Express Js), Firebase Authentication, Mongo DB, Django. You will get 24hrs support in this course.

App Development refers to the creation of computer applications for use on mobile devices such as tablets, smartphones and smart watches. Mobile device features such as cameras, motion and location awareness can be used to create unique and inventive mobile-only applications for things such as taxi and bike sharing.
